text: jo jhadapathi avanarum dhana ane karana hota ane sarala musaphari hota to, a loko jarura tamari pachala avata, parantu te loko para durani musaphari muskela tha'i ga'i, have to a loko allahana namani sogando khase ke jo amaramam sakti ane himmata hota to, ame kharekhara tamari sathe avata, a loko pote ja potane nasta kari rahya che, te'ona juththanannum sacum jnana allaha pase ja che
